title: Q&A for Managing manure beyond the farmyard: Manure management for less-typical species and settings

tasks.task: Answering questions related to waste management and utilization in aquaculture and alligator farming.
subtasks: Discussing fish hydrolysate production and its uses.
Exploring the potential of using fish waste for fertilizer and addressing odor concerns.
Discussing the transportability and application of cervid manure (e.g., deer farming waste).
Addressing challenges in making aquaculture competitive with foreign markets, focusing on price and product distribution.
Exchanging information on the management practices of alligators in controlled environments.
Reviewing the main purposes of raising different species of cervids (e.g., deer ranching for hunting and meat).
